name: Critter Caper
description:
After years in hiding, the critter crew is back together for one last heist! Switch control between each of the 5 team members and use their unique abilities to make it through Scotland's Yard, a deadly place protecting a delicious treasure. Stealth and teamwork will see them to the end of: Critter Caper.

Credits

  • Code + Level Design -- Merlin Benneth
  • Character Art + Writing -- Emma Price
  • UI Design + Environment Art -- Olivia Toiber aka artkidweez
  • Music + Sound Design -- Greystar

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • LMB and RMB for special abilities
  • 1-5 or Mouse Wheel to switch characters
